Rockseeker dusted himself and looked at his sister.

Rockseeker: Do not forget, we must kill them to the last. Otherwise, 
Master might suffer from it... or even more...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Lunekill : :
> 
> Lunekill looked disgusted at the thought of the worthless lifeforms.
> 
> Lunekill: Cybertronian transformers, bleh. We'll take care of them 
the same way we do all lower beings... total anihalation!
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rockseeker, was not so happy to see her, but a least, she had 
helped 
> him out. When she asked, however, why she was helping him, he began 
> to feel embarassed, and grudgingly decided to tell her what had 
> happened.
> 
> Rockseeker: I went into an Energon surge and attacked those pesky 
> Cybertronians. Yes, even I can surge! The Energon here is so strong 
> that I lost all restraints. Master will like it... Now, how should 
we 
> rid ourselves of the ants?
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Lunekill : :
> > 
> > Lunekill arrived on Earth and was soon at her brother's side, 
> finding him buried under the rubble.
> > Lunekill: Hahaha, caught between a rock and a hard place.
> >  
> > She starts to move the boulders off him.
> >  
> > Lunekill: Remind me why I'm helping you...
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Rockseeker's is a meteor.
> > 
> > BIC:
> > 
> > Rockseeker: Don't think I really wish to see you, sister. I only 
> did 
> > so because our Master told me he'd send you to get rid of the 
> > Cybertronians. Now hurry up and get here!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : Lunekill : :
> > > 
> > > From somewhere in the vastness of space, a telepathic signal is 
> > transmitted. It reaches Rockseeker on Earth, through the barrier 
of 
> > linear time.
> > > 
> > > *It has been along time since you have contacted me brother. I 
> will 
> > come to aid you. Soon we will be together, to serve our lord.*
> > > 
> > > OOC: I'm not sure of her alt mode and all right now. I'm still 
> > working on the first sketch of her design. I'll probably make 
some 
> > changes and do another then come up with a final copy.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Boulders had literally buried him. He was aching from the 
> injuries 
> > he 
> > > had suffered, but it was a good sign - he was still online. 
> > However, 
> > > he was also depleted.
> > > 
> > > He tried to push himself out of the rubbles, but found that he 
> > could 
> > > not. He then resorted to doing what he didn't want to; calling 
> out 
> > to 
> > > his sister.
> > > 
> > > Rockseeker: Sister Lunekill, do you hear me? I'm trapped under 
a 
> > pile 
> > > of rock. Care to lend a hand?
> > >
